attributes.title: Literally the worse app ever
attributes.review:
This app is so buggy it’s insane. I can hardly use it and honestly, even if it worked it would still be the ugliest and least user-friendly app I’ve ever downloaded. 

Ok but for real, shame on Apple for just allowing just anything to be published in their store. This man and his platform are hateful and responsible for the deaths and oppression of countless Americans. Maybe Apple thinks allowing him to have an app in their store is a free speech issue, but they are a private business that should have the courage to stand behind everything that they give a platform too and therefore better take responsibility and shut down this app.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!✨☕️🍊
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to see my fav oompa loompa😻✨ so i opened the app and i saw a photoshopped picture of a 🍊cheeto and harry styles mixed🤮 it was horrendous. then i started signing in and it asked for my ☎️ number!! i got a little suspicious 😒 but i put it in anyways🤠🧚🏻‍♀️✨ but then i got spammed then he sent some things... not gonna get into the details though🧚🏻‍♀️✨ then my cat got a text and it was a big FAT cheeto🍊 lookin oompa loompa🤮✨ my cats eyes and brain started burning and stinging🙀 long story short, my cats funeral was yesterday.😿✨ 
lesson learned dont download or ur cat will be next.🧚🏻‍♀️✨
anyways.. someone plz get me some chick-fl-a😻🥺💕✨thanks luv👑
